description:
We finally convinced one of our most requested guys to come back down to our location so we could get an updated solo. So welcome Hoyce. He's one of those big, playful, happy guys who likes to party, watch football and find women who want to come home with him.
When he showed up, he was excited and happy to see us again. He begged for us to give him a straight scene too. Since Hoyce's our pal, we hooked him up with a chic later that week.
So enjoy as stud-wrestler Hoyce enjoys some alone time on the couch with his favorite skin flick. That was fun, but he'd rather hump the bed until his balls get really tight, so he can shoot stream after stream of fun man-milk onto himself. Thata boy!
title: Hoyce
